# type

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates whether the line item is final or pending.

## Declaration

```swift
ApplePayLineItemType type;
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItemType] for valid values.

The default value is `final`.

Note that if a line item’s [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItem/type] is `pending`, the Apple Pay payment sheet doesn’t display the value in [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItem/amount], and instead displays “pending”.

If a line item’s [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItem/type] is `final`, the payment sheet displays the value in [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItem/amount].

## Line Item Type

- **ApplePayLineItemType**: A type that indicates whether a line item is final or pending.

## Setting line item properties

- **label**: A required value that’s a short, localized description of the line item.
- **amount**: A required value that’s the monetary amount of the line item.
- **ApplePayLineItemType**: A type that indicates whether a line item is final or pending.
